short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supercharge your Trello with Super Trello!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly manage Trello from anywhere on the web! ✨  Super Trello is your one-stop shop for Trello productivity:

✨ Add cards instantly: See something, Trello it! Add cards directly from any website with ease.

✨ Screenshots in a snap! Attach screenshots to your cards to capture important details visually.

✨ Stay on top of your workload: Super Trello displays the age of your cards, helping you prioritize tasks.

✨ Never lose track: Card numbers are conveniently shown for easy reference.

✨ Organize with ease: Create new lists directly within the extension to keep your Trello boards tidy.

Install now and unleash your Trello superpowers!
